channel.title: Name command
channel.description:
hmm okay i want to make like a name changer command, this is what i have.
[code=java]if (command.startsWith("Name1") && command.length() > 6) { playerName = command.substring(6); sM("Your new Name is \""+command.substring(6)+"\""); }[/code]
i made this quick but it only makes a new character but with everything on it like:
character1 (darren)
use the command to ::name1 darren1
then his name will still be darren. but if he logs out and logs in with darren1 then he got everything that darren has.
but i wanna make it so when ur on darren the name will change automaticly to darren1
any ideas ?
Thanks

item.title: Name command
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=485420.msg3556660#msg3556660 date=1301953149]

[quote author=P A N I C link=topic=485420.msg3556658#msg3556658 date=1301953011]

if (command.startsWith("Name1") && command.length() > 6) { playerName = command.substring(6); c.disconnected = true; sM("Your new Name is \""+command.substring(6)+"\""); }

  • its gonna delete the chracter file not disconnect it.

Read full topic
